mcq.statement: Which of the following international decades took place from 2001 to 2010?

options.a: Second International Decade for the Eradication of Colonialism
options.b: Decade to Roll Back Malaria in Development Countries, Particularly in Africa
options.c: International Decade for a Culture of Peace and Non-violence for the Children of the World

mcq.one_liner: From 2001 to 2010, the world observed the Second International Decade for the Eradication of Colonialism, the Decade to Roll Back Malaria in Developing Countries, Particularly in Africa, and the International Decade for a Culture of Peace and Non-violence for the Children of the World.
